cause_of_action: vague and insufficiently detailed statement of claim
application_details: proposed amendments clarify some points but do not resolve fundamental deficiencies
procedure_followed: judicial review of the adequacy of the plaintiff's pleadings under procedural rules
decision_reasoning: breach of statute alone does not constitute a cause of action without linking it to negligence or intentional harm
contract claims are conceded invalid due to statutory exclusivity
tort claims lack specificity regarding conspiracy, defamation, or other alleged wrongs
result_of_case: claim dismissed with opportunity for amendment
standard_of_proof: clearly articulate material facts and legal grounds for relief
decision_conclusion: statement of claim is struck out for failing to disclose a cause of action
